Nemesis Enforcer:

::Nemesis nods::

::Several hours later, Nemesis walks around the base, noticing it's quite 
empty::
"By the Pit, where did everyone go?"  
<Wolfgang, this is your current leader (Nemesis chuckles) orders you to keep 
all defenses on red alert, prep for any attacks.  If anyone tries anything, I 
want this base to crush any opposition.  Stay up for the night shift, I will 
take day.  Make sure not to sleep too heavily>
